definition: axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant

sentences.english: Stem segments of Chrysanthemum morifolium with axillary bud were cultured in vitro on base MS medium.
sentences.chinese: 以MS作爲基本培養基，離體培養千頭菊帶腋芽莖段。

sentences.english: In this test , axillary buds of Melastoma dodecandrum were collected as explants studied on tissue culture and rapid propagation.
sentences.chinese: 採用鋪地錦的腋芽作外植體進行組培和快繁研究。

sentences.english: Axillary bud will grow quickly after decapitation during tobacco leaf production.
sentences.chinese: 在菸葉生產中，煙株打頂之後腋芽會迅速發生。

sentences.english: Axillary buds are hidden beneath fleshy leaf petioles .
sentences.chinese: 腋芽隱藏下方肉質葉，葉柄。

sentences.english: Subsequent growth of some of the axillaries results in first - order branching of the main stem.
sentences.chinese: 一些腋芽繼續生長形成主莖的第一級分枝。

sentences.english: In this paper, a preliminary study on the axillary bud culture of seed plants of sugarbeet is in progress.
sentences.chinese: 本文對甜菜種株腋芽的培養進行了初步研究。

sentences.english: Each branch of the axillary long can see axillary bud.
sentences.chinese: 長枝每個葉腋均可見到腋芽。

sentences.english: The accumulation of carbohydrate supplied the matter and energy for the axillary buds to grow.
sentences.chinese: 碳水化合物的積累爲腋芽的產生提供了物質基礎。

sentences.english: Shifting reaping stage to an appropriate earlier time is advantageous to protect the physiology activity of these buds.
sentences.chinese: 適當提早收割頭季稻，有利於保護低位腋芽生理活性。

definition: terminal bud (growing at the tip of a plant)
ear (of corn or sorghum etc)/bunch (of grapes)/infructescence
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
